reviews.text: I just returned from a weekend at this hotel. I went with my mother and sister and we booked adjoining rooms on the executive floor. The rooms were large with huge windows and good views. The bathroom was all marble with a huge walk in shower . The hotel has an indoor and outdoor heated pool and 2 hot tubs. We did not here another person all night . The staff was pleasant and helpfull. the location next to the casino is excellent. One of the best hotels that I have stayed in .
reviews.title: great hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Lac Leamy the week-end of March 30, 2007. The hotel is beautiful. The rooms are large well-appointed, i.e. marble bathroom. The beds are extremely comfortable only downfall is that they are double beds not queen or king. The check in was quick and easy and express check out was even better. The hotel has a beautiful indoor and outdoor pool. The Casino is attached through a walkway and is lots of fun. Even though I lost lots of money at the casino the hotel and week-end was still fun. The restaurant "Arome" at the Hilton is wonderful. We had their buffet breakfast and the food quality and service was worth every penny. Also, 5 min drive from Ottawa...the nicest plave to stay in the region!
reviews.title: First class hotel

likes.disliked: — double beds would have preferred 2 larger beds in room

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel Oct. 1 - 3, 2006.
reviews.title: Nice Executive Floor rooms!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice hotel with a Casino attached. Friendly staff even if you don't speak French.
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.text: I got a room on the 18th floor. Executive rooms start on the 18th floor and up. You get to go to the Executive lounge where there is breakfast and cocktails/snacks in the afternoon.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Okay Service
Highly recommended!
reviews.text: I absolutely adore this hotel. It is the only hotel that I stay at whenever I am in the Ottawa-Gatineau region. Walking into the grand lobby at night is quite a spectacle. I was there last week and booked a Deluxe King room overlooking the lake. The room was spacious and clean with a large marble bathroom that includes a separate shower and bath. During the summer months the Arome restaurant opens its balcony overlooking the lake so that you can eat outside. All in all a wonderful 4 day stay.

reviews.title: Magnificient rooms!!! Highly recommend!
reviews.text: What a great place to stay!!! The room is nicely decorated, the bathroom is spacious and beautiful (one of the nicest bathroom I have seen in a hotel). Walking distance to the Casino. Highly recommend!!!! Beautiful hotel !

reviews.title: Hilton weekend from hell
reviews.text: I went with my wife for a weekend Canada day getaway at this Hilton Lac Leamy, as we pulled up and stop the car there where no bellboy to be seen, as I finished putting all our luggage on a dolly, then the bell boy shows up, later, taking a stroll in the hallways, noticed in the cigar shop, went in shopping for some magazines, noticed that the music in the background music was rap music, kinda of particular for a 5 star hotel , I also noticed that the staff & personnel did not look very friendly or helpful even for the simplist question, got answered I don't know..., next day after my wife was having a therapeutic massage (which was pretty good) after we went off to play some billiard, we had to ask at the sports counter for the rack of balls, they just handed over the tray and said ‘here’, I started getting the feeling this complex was run buy a bunch of co-eds or disgruntle employees, anyways, later we wanted to take advantage of the pool, I had a bathrobe that was kind of small for my size ( I’m not particular overweight just 260 lbs / 6 feet ) It looked on me as it had shrunk in washing, so I asked the pool person for a better sized bathrobe, he replied that they just had that one size and he could give my 2 one for the front and one for the back, I got really annoyed at this point, later while in the hot exterior mini pool, was talking about my recent experiences with other guests, at my surprise they also had their own run-ins with this staff, one couple (in their retirement) told me that they had a habit of late tea, they went to the hotel restaurant (closing was near) they got told that it would be a hassle for the tea, they would have to make a table just for the tea, so they declined and left an other account at the same hot pool was of a 35 year old woman who told us they where staying on an executive floor they told us they like to dress simple (young & sporty attire, they where from some kind of tv production team) while on in the executive cocktail lounge, they where asked if they really belonged in the executive section or if they where lost, while discussing with these guests in the hot pool area, I couldn’t help noticing the handyman service guy in jeans with shirt hanging out of from his pants, joking around with the female guests. Later that same evening from the second level terrace, young kids were throwing rocks on to the guest in the pool, had to dodge a few pebbles myself.

We had a Voucher package (all inclusive with Réservation Outaouais), for the dinner & breakfast we had to give out coupons for our meal, when we gave them out they where looking at them a bit funny like they didn’t know about these coupons, for breakfast (Arome restaurant ) someone even told us next time we must give them before your meal please not after, we felt cheap to say the least to a point of not wanting to hand them over and pay for our meals, the last night after we went to sleep, around 1am we heard very loud yelling on our floor like there was some fight that was going about to breakout or something, at this point we where very concerned, which in turn had a very bad night sleeping, next morning we where very anxious to leave this place. We did mention all this to the hotel front desk via the phone during the evening before the yelling they told us that they couldn’t do anything and that we could leave a complaint, that is way we didn’t bother calling about the yelling at 1am, we choose to leave immediately as soon as daybreak. Worst weekend ever!!! Absolutely a weekend to forget !!!!
reviews.title: Absolutely Impressed!!
5-star hotel - 1-star service
reviews.text: A service rep called from the hotel that same day, tried to downplay the hole situation and defending the Hotel of course, also told me that most of the hired staff jobs are subbed out, and the hotel is a franchise, they also told me they couldn’t do much except to maybe offer me an other weekend at the same place, wasn’t going to happen (a refund would have been a nice gesture & still waiting for an official apology, doubt if they will even call us back), the Québec government owns most of this franchise, so that explains the poor service with rude attitude experienced from this hotel, my advice, pass up this Hilton & stay with Fairmont Hotel chain, I’ve experienced only good to excellent service with them.

reviews.title: Great for conferences too!
reviews.text: This year will be our second year that we host our annual Dealer Meeting at the Hilton. Yes, the Hilton is by far the most luxurious and beautiful hotel in the Gatineau and Ottawa area. The rooms are incredible, the restaurants within the hotel as well as the Casino are great. As far as helping you plan a conference - this to me is what they are experts in! From beginning to end, the entire staff are at your beck and call! And believe me ... I used them every two minutes and not once did they make me feel as if I was putting them out. If you're considering hosting a conference at the hotel - don't hesitate. They have the facilities, the knowledge and the expertise. The theatre at the Casino is always amazing as well. Your guests will not be disappointed!

reviews.title: Hilton Hotel
reviews.text: We had a great time at the Hilton Lac Lemay Hotel. It is very beautiful and well maintained with very good service and helpful staff.We went to see the Elvis Story at the Casino's Theatre and enjoyed the Broadway show very much. The theatre is awesome.We would recommend the hotel to anyone.

reviews.title: Superb!
reviews.text: I stayed here for one night and got an executive room on the 18th floor. Coming into the hotel, there are glass sculptures everywhere.

reviews.title: Among the best in the Hilton chain
reviews.text: (Made by Dale Chihuly?) I didn't really get a chance to use the facilities but there's a game room on some floor with a pool table. For the executive lounge, it's not as good as the Toronto Hilton but there are free desserts in the evening as well as an honour bar. The room itself was magnificent. Lots of space, marble flooring in the entraceway (huge, by the way) and in the bathrooms. I had two leather armchairs in my room. Service was impeccable. It is definitely a great hotel to stay in!

reviews.title: A five-star gem!
reviews.text: Great hotel in the greater Ottawa region. This property is next to the Gatineau Casino. The rooms are very spacious, you will love the bathroom with it's separate bath & shower. No reason to stay in a Ottawa hotel.

reviews.title: Best Hotel in Canada!!!
reviews.text: You have to see it to believe it! Rated "Best Hilton in North America 2002, 2004), it puts all other Hiltons to shame. From the Glass art in the lobby, to the outdoor heated pool, you will agree that this hotel goes beyond your expectations. The front desk is surrounded with priceless art designed by the renowned Dale Chihuly. The piano bar/cigar lounge was very pleasant after a "five diamond" dinner at the Baccara.

If luxury at low price is your thing, then don't hesitate. The Hilton Lac-Leamy includes a casino, two pools, three hot-tubs, sauna, piano bar, cigar lounge, spa, executive lounge, congress centre, free parking, just to name some of the services offered.
reviews.title: A favourite
Wonderful Hotel - Can't wait to go back!!
reviews.text: My stay here was unbelievable and I hope I can share this joy with as many readers possible.

reviews.title: Excellent Hotel
reviews.text: Have stayed here twice. Find it excellent value. Pool is fantastic. Location to Ottawa convenient. Restaurant and food above average. Bedding and rooms topnotch. I would recommend this hotel without hesitation.
This hotel has it all!! - great service, atmosphere, food, views, location...
reviews.title: Outstanding
